Texts.Chs:
从陨落中孕育出来的共生体。存在知觉。不寻常而有韧性十足的民族，他们挣扎，想要解答他们来自何处的问题。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% 电气, 毒素抗性, +^green;40^reset;% 火炎抗性
  坠落伤害 x^green;0.85^reset;
  +^green;1^reset;% 生命回复
  科技: ^green;粘性球, 攀墙^reset;
  ^cyan;廿一^reset;: 粘液弹性, 粘性, 中毒, 蛛网

^orange;环境^reset;:
  凝胶和沼泽的生物群落: HP x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;15^reset;% 速度
  寒冷生物群落: HP x^red;0.75^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  鞭: 伤害 x^green;1.2^reset;, 防御 x^green;1.12^reset;
  生物/粘液/活体武器: 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;%^reset; 暴击伤害

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% 寒气抗性, -^red;25^reset;% 辐射抗性
  +^red;25^reset;% 饥饿速率
Texts.Eng:
Symbiotes birthed from the fallen. Sentient. An unusual and resilient people who struggle to come to grips with where they came from.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;20^reset;% Electric, Poison, +^green;40^reset;% Fire
  Fall Damage x^green;0.85^reset;
  +^green;1^reset;% Health Regen
  Tech: ^green;Sticky ball, Wall Grab^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slime Bounce, Slime Stick, Poison, Webs

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Gelatinous, Bog and Swamp biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  Cold biomes: Health x^red;0.75^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Whips: Damage x^green;1.2^reset;, Defense x^green;1.12^reset;
  Bio/Slime/Living: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;%^reset; Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Ice, -^red;25^reset;% Radiation
  +^red;25^reset;% Hunger Drain
